hostile_takeover.description: Declare yourself, and up to your Presence in allies beside you, a rightful guest, unharried by protection from intruders.

alternate 1.effect: You may contest Presence + Intimidation + Wyrd vs Composure + Tolerance to provoke a Fugue in the victim.

alternate 2.effect: Add Glamour to name a conditional trigger that hangs for a day.

mask_of_superiority.description: Apply your Presence as false Status, convincing others you rank in their organization.

paralyzing_presence.description: Overwhelm a target with your presence, rendering them Insensate.

darkling.cost: Shadow weapons may blind instead of damaging.

summon_the_loyal_servant.loopholes,: A favor for the source element
summon_the_loyal_servant.description: Conjure a loyal servant from the elements for a scene, like a weak Hedge ghost.

elemental.cost: Add Glamour when the sun reaches the horizon to reset the Contract's duration and add a cumulative +1 to pursue.

tumult.loopholes,: Plant folding paper on the subject
tumult.description: Fold a subject's name to read her weaknesses and spend successes on inflicting disorienting Conditions or specifying conditional triggers.

discreet_summons.loopholes,: From an enemy's holdings, or for good payment
discreet_summons.description: For one scene, draw out a desired Size 1 object or, with two Glamour, invite a hobgoblin to perform a task.

mastermind's_gambit.description: Dramatically monologue a +5 plan into existence for a session.

pipes_of_the_beastcaller.dice_pool: Manipulation + Animal Ken + Wyrdvs Resolve + Composure
pipes_of_the_beastcaller.description: Summon and command animals of a given species with a silver flute.

the_royal_court.description: Forbid violence from breaking out in a mediated gathering.

wizened.cost: Know the details of the breaking of the promise.

spinning_wheel.description: Destine a subject for a certain circumstance or encounter, applying successes as bonuses to approach that destiny or penalties to avoid it.

blessing_of_perfection.description: Bless and encourage an object or a Computer, Crafts or Medicine task, substituting your Wyrd as the equipment or Skill dice.

changing_fortunes.description: Whisper tales to curse or bless a subject's next action, by a two-dice modifier or one-success exceptional threshold shift per success. May target a given subject once per session.

light-shy.description: Fade from conscious notice while your actions remain subtle and you inflict no harm or magic.

murkblur.description: Blind a target with fantastic distractions for a turn.

trivial_reworking.loopholes,: Touch something similar to your chosen Mask
trivial_reworking.description: Mask an object up to Size 3.

changeling_hours.loopholes,: Name a past owner of the object
changeling_hours.description: Grasp and push an object's time, reversing or accelerating its aging or freezing it in place.

dance_of_the_toys.description: Operate a mechanical device at will.

hidden_reality.loopholes,: A show of searching and finding the feature
hidden_reality.description: Temporarily realize possible imagined features of your surroundings.

stealing_the_solid_reflection.loopholes,: A remark of indebtedness from the owner
stealing_the_solid_reflection.description: Pull an object's mundane reflection out of a reflective surface.

tatterdemalion's_workshop.description: Jury-rig anything up to Size 5 with no tools and only vaguely associated materials, applying half Wyrd (rounded up) as a crafting bonus.

glimpse_of_a_distant_mirror.description: Use a reflective surface as a window to look out another surface that has reflected your face

know_the_competition.description: Play a game to observe a competitor's Anchors and one Aspiration

portents_and_visions.description: Enter a glossolalic trance to glimpse an important event in the past or present of a visible subject.

read_lucidity.description: Intuit a character's Clarity and any Clarity Conditions.

walls_have_ears.description: Share secrets with an object to learn how it was constructed and how to repair or destroy it, how to best use it, or what was happening when it was last touched.

props_and_scenery.description: Duplicate the form of a present object up to your Size, adding extra bonuses with successes.

reflections_of_the_past.description: Rewind a reflective surface to watch a reflected scene from a specified time, ranging in Glamour cost from a week ago to a decade ago.

riddle-kith.loopholes,: Give a gift to someone of the imitated kith
riddle-kith.description: Remold a changeling's fae mien into that of another kith. Face a breaking point with 3 dice upon an unwilling subject.

skinmask.description: Recite three details about a mortal or Masked being to copy their appearance with your Mask (and your mien if appropriate).

unravel_the_tapestry.description: Replay the last ten seconds or combat round, with the actions of others unchanged. Once per story, reflexively activate when killed.

cloak_of_night.description: While sneaking in dim light without drawing attention actively, add half Wyrd (rounded up) to Stealth rolls. You and up to your Dexterity in allies may take a reflexive Stealth action each turn, and your Stealth actions conceal your allies.

fae_cunning.description: Retain Defense against Firearms and surprise attacks. Successful Dodges may redirect attacks, automatically succeeding by your Presence.

shared_burden.description: Shed blood on a subject, suffering resistant lethal damage to heal them at a 1:2 point ratio, healing bashing before lethal.

thorns_and_brambles.description: Thorns emerge around you, either draining Glamour from those who move quickly through them, forcing a Dexterity + Athletics roll to avoid being Immobilized, or attacking with your Wyrd as a dice pool.

trapdoor_spider's_trick.loopholes,: Lure an enemy through the passage
trapdoor_spider's_trick.description: Cause an open passage to appear sealed for a scene, or with Willpower, until dawn or dusk.

fortifying_presence.description: Heal two mild Clarity damage, or one severe, through one-on-one interaction with a subject.

hedgewall.loopholes,: Plant a seed from the Hedge
hedgewall.description: Surround yourself with a fortress of thorns for (10 × Wyrd) yards, conferring substantial concealment from ranged attacks and inflicting lethal damage when climbed.

pure_clarity.loopholes,: Wear a gauntlet and silk glove
pure_clarity.description: Steel yourself to shrug off one breaking point caused by your actions within a scene.

vow_of_no_compromise.loopholes,: Destroy a symbol of the Gentry
vow_of_no_compromise.description: Touch a subject and become Stoic to downgrade a point of aggravated damage.

whispers_of_morning.description: Become insubstantial like a Hedge ghost.

boon_of_the_scuttling_spider.description: Cross walls, ceilings, and treacherous terrain freely.

dreamsteps.loopholes,: A childhood comfort of yours or your Touchstone's
dreamsteps.description: Touch a sleeper and enter their dream in Dream Form.

pathfinder.description: Dowse your way to a given feature of the Hedge.

seven-league_leap.loopholes,: Boots newly stolen from an enemy
seven-league_leap.description: Clear (10 × Wyrd) yards with a Strength + Athletics leap.

chrysalis.loopholes,: Near the chosen animal in its habitat
chrysalis.description: Transform into one of two Size 1-7 animals chosen when you buy this Contract, able to communicate with fellow such animals.

flickering_hours.description: Individually half or double the rate of time through the Hedge for yourself, or with Willpower, fellow travellers or pursuers. Until next sunrise or sunset, confer the Edge and the Fleet of Foot Merit with a rating of your Wyrd on quickened beneficiaries. Roll only if contested.

leaping_toward_nightfall.description: Push a character or object up to Size 10 forward in time with a riddle for a set duration up to your successes in days.

mirror_walk.loopholes,: The name of someone reflected on the other side
mirror_walk.description: Reach or travel through reflective surfaces, into one nearby and out one you have touched before.

talon_and_wing.loopholes,: Eat a piece of the chosen animal
talon_and_wing.description: Gain the +10 Speed, the +3 perception senses, and/or the upgraded unarmed damage of a chosen animal.

elemental_weapon.loopholes,: Perform a trick with the element
elemental_weapon.description: Fashion an archaic weapon from the elements, applying successes to increase weapon rating or range or reduce Initiative penalty.

might_of_the_terrible_brute.description: Add a grapple maneuver to steal the opponent's Strength, immobilizing them when emptied.

primal_glory.description: Embrace an element as 1/1 Armor that deals lethal damage in close contact. Suffer no damage from the e,lement as it is, and half magical damage from it.

touch_of_wrath.description: Cause Structure damage to an object with touch and threats.

elemental_fury.description: Conjure Environmental Tilts from the elements.

oathbreaker's_punishment.description: Intuit the most serious promise a person has broken without making amends. You may harrow the person within the fortnight with a waking nightmare for each success.

red_revenge.description: Go Berserk. Take 3/3 Armor and +3 to Initiative, Intimidation, and Physical dice pools.

relentless_pursuit.description: Name your quarry to intuit their direction, distance, and dimension from you until next sunrise or sunset.

thief_of_reason.loopholes,: Victim expresses doubt in their sanity
thief_of_reason.description: Roll successes as a Clarity attack, or an attack to temporarily reduce another stability trait. The attack also saps Willpower. Suffer a breaking point at 4 dice.

cupid's_arrow.description: Learn a subject's most ardent desire, and any associated Conditions or Tilts. You may refocus them around a new desire for a scene.

dreams_of_the_earth.description: Lull a subject to sleep, which only lethal damage may interrupt for a minute per success.

gift_of_warm_breath.loopholes,: Feed them with your own cooking
gift_of_warm_breath.description: Heal a subject of fatigue and bashing damage.

spring's_kiss.description: Inflict Heavy Rain, and for extra Glamour, Flooded.

wyrd-faced_stranger.description: Appear as whom a subject most wants to see. Add your Mantle as bonus dice to stay in character.

blessing_of_spring.description: Brew a cordial of spring that causes plants to mature and fruit, heals animals and people of damage and transitory illness and poisons, and cures changelings of one Clarity Condition and point of Clarity damage. Everything returns after a scene.

gift_of_warm_blood.description: Downgrade a point of damage on the subject for each success.

pandora's_gift.loopholes,: Target just gave you a gift
pandora's_gift.description: Initiate a Build Equipment action at double the speed to mold a subject's desires into an object until next sunrise or sunset. Use as a bribe for a +3 Social bonus and a Glamour point.

prince_of_ivy.description: Summon strangling vines. Each turn, you may sacrifice your movement, your action, and/or your Defense to establish a new grapple per. The vines roll successes as a dice pool at +3 and contest grapples reflexively.

waking_the_inner_fae.description: Inflict Wanton with a counterfeit gift wreath. Once a scene for the remaining story, recover Willpower by enticing your last victim into an action.

baleful_sense.description: Smell a subject's fiercest anger, and any associated Conditions or Tilts. You may refocus them around a new enmity for a scene.

child_of_the_hearth.loopholes,: Blow on an ember or spark
child_of_the_hearth.description: Inflict Extreme Heat or Extreme Cold, and shield yourself from either.

helios's_light.description: Project blinding sunlight, dealing half its damage as an occult bane.

high_summer's_zeal.description: Force a foe to spend Willpower or stand and fight, ignoring Beaten Down.

vigilance_of_ares.description: Predict ambushes and traps. Add Mantle to Initiative.

fiery_tongue.description: Rebuke and insults open two Doors and deal bashing damage, or lethal against the fae.

flames_of_summer.description: Ignore wound penalties and unconsciousness from injury, and take +2 as a Physical bonus.

helios's_judgment.description: Use a ray of sunlight as a returning thrown weapon with Mantle for a weapon rating, Range 10/30/50, and Initiative -2. With Willpower, it deals aggravated damage.

solstice_revelation.description: Illuminate an area to prevent hiding, forcing a Manipulation + Tolerance - Mantle roll to preserve mundane stealth, or a Clash of Wills against supernatural stealth.

sunburnt_heart.description: Drive a subject Berserk, and add Mantle as a bonus to redirect their fury.

autumn's_fury.loopholes,: Level a metal rod at foes
autumn's_fury.description: Breathe out the Heavy Rain and Heavy Wind Tilts around you. For extra Glamour, each turn, the storm rolls successes as a +1L attack pool.

last_harvest.description: Once per session, take 9-Again to harvest Glamour from a subject, or 8-Again to harvest the Glamour of Autumn.

tale_of_the_baba_yaga.description: Render the audience of a scary story Shaken.

twilight's_harbinger.loopholes,: Item of value to an involved subject
twilight's_harbinger.description: Know by omens when a given circumstance's end is about to come.

witches'_intuition.description: Taste a target's greatest fear, and any associated Conditions or Tilts. You may refocus them around a new fear for the scene.

famine's_bulwark.description: Read omens to ask the Storyteller a yes-or-no question per success. With multiple successes, one answer is false.

mien_of_the_baba_yaga.description: Appear as a subject's greatest fear, driving them to flee and attacking their Clarity if applicable.

riding_the_falling_leaves.description: Erupt into leaves flying on the wind. Once per turn, reflexively Dodge a non-saturation attack, and spend Glamour to inflict Spooked on success.

sorcerer's_rebuke.loopholes,: Half a minute of grand warning
sorcerer's_rebuke.description: Touch a subject to strip them of Glamour or other supernatural energies.

tasting_the_harvest.description: Eat subjects' fears, immunizing them from natural fear and adding your Mantle to contest supernatural fears. Grant +1 to rally against one such fear.

the_dragon_knows.description: Taste a subject's deepest regret, and any associated Conditions or Tilts. You may refocus them around a new sorrow for a scene.

heart_of_ice.description: Freeze down to the heart, becoming immune to cold and emotional sway.

ice_queen's_call.description: Gather the Blizzard Tilt, to which you are immune.

slipknot_dreams.description: Take the place of a subject's regretful yearning, rendering them Swooned.

touch_of_winter.loopholes,: Write your name in the surface
touch_of_winter.description: Flash-freeze a body of water by touch.

ermine's_winter_coat.description: Blend in, taking +3 to Stealth and penalizing attacks against you by -3. In mundane company, reduce the bonus for fae to pick you out as if at half Wyrd.

fallow_fields.description: Temporarily empty a subject's capacity for love, rendering them Broken and denying the use of their Anchors.

field_of_regret.description: Harrow others with lonely hauntings, sapping Willpower and inflicting lethal damage.

mantle_of_frost.description: Project an Extreme Cold strong enough to encase subjects in ice, to which you are immune.

winter's_curse.description: Freeze a subject's heart except concerning you, stripping the capacity for teamwork or Willpower and holding breaking points in abeyance.

peacemaker's_draw.dice_pool: Dexterity + (Firearms or Athletics) + Mantlevs Stamina + Wyrd
peacemaker's_draw.loopholes,: Target broke a standoff with the changeling within the last turn
peacemaker's_draw.description: Strike a item from the subjects person away without inflicting damage or inflict a Personal Tilt on them. Subject also gains the Leveraged Condition.

draw_likeness.loopholes,: Victim of one the target's crimes described them to the changeling during this scene
draw_likeness.description: Changeling renders a likeness to any flat surface graphite could mark. Grant one Clue about the targets whereabouts or activity to anyone examining the likeness for the first time and all rolls about matching the likeness to a face gain the rote quality. If the changeling names a general crime, the target is any person closest to the changeling that commited it within the last lunar month.

blessing_of_forgetfulness.description: Overwrite the memory of one incident with an innocuous replacement.

glib_tongue.description: Tell a lie which mortals always believe. Add your Wyrd as a Subterfuge bonus against supernatural listeners.

goblin's_eye.loopholes,: Mark your eyelids with owl's feather ashes
goblin's_eye.description: You may Clash of Wills to pierce magical concealment by kenning, and ask questions about the nature of a kenned supernatural effect.

huntsman's_clarion.description: Detect the presence, but not location, of Arcadian forces for a mile per Wyrd, starting in the Hedge.

lost_visage.description: Erase yourself from memories of a scene. Supernatural memories force a Clash of Wills, and Gentry and Huntsmen are immune.

mantle_mask.description: Appear to assume a different Court Mantle, or lack thereof.

sight_of_truth_and_lies.description: So long as you tell no lies, identify mundane lies and force a Clash of Wills against supernatural lies.

uncanny.description: Take the rote quality on your next nonmagical, unresisted and uncontested rolled action.

wayward_guide.description: Alter signs and markers to make mortals lose their way. You may target yourself to force a Clash of Wills against supernatural trackers.
